name: No Love Lost
description:
Choose your crew and shuttle down to your battleground: In this exhilarating third-person, action-adventure, a carnivorous alien planet with a vicious bite awaits your arrival! There’s only one reason to risk your life on Drosera – the lucrative resource called Nectar. Pick 1 of 2 crews to join and get ready to raid!

In 15-minute sessions, race through a vibrant planet with over 4 lush biomes on state-of-the-art hoverboards. Compete in quests to garner your team more Nectar and dodge perilous dangers deep within Drosera. When night falls and the real monsters come out, get back on your extraction ship stat or be left behind to become one with the planet forever!




Claw your way to the top: Choose your gear wisely! With a wide array of both melee and ranged weapons, as well as traps and gadgets, the chance to bring your team to victory is never out of reach…or certain fate.

Harvest smart or risk it all: Only those who make it on the extraction ship will leave with their Nectar, so optimize your tactics, rally your crew and use ANY means necessary to get your nectar onboard!

Death is NOT the end: Our respawn system keeps you and your friends together in the action for the entire raid! Revive fallen teammates and plot your revenge to steal that Nectar back!




What kind of Raider will you be? For every day that you survive, gain perks to strengthen your resolve for the next round! Mix and match builds to get the perfect perk combination but beware! Getting stranded on Drosera means losing your perks until your next successful run.




Discover all the planet has to offer: Drosera is a world full of mystery and much of it has yet to be revealed! Keep your eye open for continuous updates (such as new biomes, characters and gameplay additions,) being added to the world!

FEATURES:

  • Explore a dangerous planet rich with sweet, sweet Nectar in 15-minute sessions!
  • Race through DROSERA with top-of-the-line hoverboards and hoverbikes.
  • Take part in competitive questing alongside your team and your enemies!
  • Experience simultaneous PvP and PvE! Go head-to-head against the other crews and take on Droserian wildlife for bigger rewards!
  • Trade in your nectar for fancy hoverboard and weapon skins, express yourself with extra emotes and more!
  • Build your perks after every successful extraction to dominate the Raider ranks!
  • Experience a new adventure in every game with procedurally generated quest chains!
